attributes.review: I downloaded the app at 11am the app did not fully download until 9pm. Once it finally downloaded every time I opened the app it would glitch to different screens. I’m not quite sure what it is supposed to do but it serves so purpose as an app. I am completely disappointed and do not recommend!!!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!!🤬

attributes.review: After days of waiting for this app to download, my phone started glitching! A few days later, my phone almost blew up while I was sleeping!!! I had to get a new phone and a new Apple ID because the app was transferred onto my new phone, and almost ruined it!! Do NOT recommend this app 😡😡😡
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!! Do NOT download!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking i was going to get true news and i listened to the instructions and everything and it told me i was gonna turn into a hillbilly cowboy man but instead i turned into a platipus this app is a scam!!!! Never downloading again!!!
attributes.title: I turned myself into a platipus and i can’t go back

attributes.review: This app is so bad. It made my toes fall off and my dog got hit by a car because the loud   intro that plays scared my dog and it ran. then i tried to save my dog and i tripped on a knife in the grass and cut all my toes off. would not recommend. plus it’s a big cheeto man on the screen and he gives me nightmares and i think his hair is fake
attributes.title: worse app ever 😡

attributes.review:
The app took FOREVER to load🤬 when I opened the app I saw a cooked carrot AND an ompaloompa on my screen!!😤. I am SOOO disappointed that this app with terrible taste in music one KILLED MY RABBIT, and two made me go blind and deaf. I can no longer enjoy anything. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. I hope this chetto puff with hair faker than Kim K’s boobs. Dear Bunker Boy, 
🙈✨Change Yourself😫😍😚
😉🌸✨Now remove the C and E✨💫😌
attributes.title: I had to make a Hellen Keller 👩‍🦯 U👄U

attributes.review: I opened the app and it showed me pictures of stuff that I will never forget. Along with ligma I also have eye ligma from the pictures. I didn’t even get to the part where it haunted my house with evil Casper and he is touching my no no square and I don’t like so rate this app a 1 star review because Casper is too touchy.
attributes.title: It caused me to get ligma

attributes.review: The app started off as wonderful but then started to glitch to a white screen whenever i would click on something, maybe needs some bug fixes. hope to see it fixed soon.
attributes.title: unfortunately did not work

attributes.review: Not only does he look like a cheeto puff but he also has the puny brain capacity of one. Very negative app that promotes toxic ☣️ behavior. Would not ❌ recommend downloading. It constantly glitches due to the bull**** that is being advocated🤬. If there were a zero star option I would’ve most definitely left one🤗.
attributes.title: Cheeto puff🟠❌

attributes.review: This app is completely and utterly useless. It doesn’t do any of the things it said and there’s no point. You can’t even stream gods menu by stray kids on it and if that doesn’t show its true colors then I don’t know what will. Out president does not Stan nct and I think that is a problem.
attributes.title: A complete waste of my time🤬🤷

attributes.review: This app has the worst loading time, the design is not pleasing, and why is there an orange man as its main character? I thought this was a game about the year 2020 and how to “trump” all of the negativity. IT WAS NOT THAT. I was horrified by the initial face that came up. If you want a pleasing game, put a pleasing to look at character on it’s home page. WORST GAME EVER
attributes.title: Idk where to begin
